text: Charles Henry Bouverie (1782 – 27 May 1836), of Betchworth House, Surrey was an English politician. Bouverie was born in 1782 the son of William Henry Bouverie who was a Member of Parliament for Salisbury. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Dorchester 1811 to 1812 and Downton from 1812 to 1813.http://www.historyofparliamentonline.org/volume/1790-1820/member/bouverie- charles-henry-1782-1836 Bouverie died on 27 May 1836 in Wimbledon. ==References== Category:1782 births Category:1836 deaths Category:People from Surrey Category:Members of the Parliament of the United Kingdom for English constituencies Category:UK MPs 1807–1812 Category:UK MPs 1812–1818
title: Charles Henry Bouverie
